title: Add Clancy and Lowry footnotes, trim whitespace
description:
This PR adds two footnotes, enriching the discussion in this chapter with relevant examples:

- Introduces Kelly Clancy's _Playing With Reality_ to support the idea of romantic intimacy as a challenging cognitive task.
- Introduces Lois Lowry's _The Giver_ to support the idea of transferring experiences directly from elders to children.

In addition, some redundant whitespace was removed throughout the chapter.
